\documentclass[varwidth]{standalone}
\tracinglostchars=3% error if a glyph is missing

\usepackage{tracefnt}
\usepackage{bm}
\usepackage{stix2}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabular}{lll llll llll llll llll}
	$A$
	& $\mathnormal{A}$
	& $\mathtt{A}$
	% serif
	& $\mathrm{A}$
	& $\mathbf{A}$
	& $\mathit{A}$
	& $\bm{\mathit{A}}$
	% sans
	& $\mathsf{A}$
	& $\mathsfit{A}$
	& $\bm{\mathsf{A}}$
	& $\bm{\mathsfit{A}}$
	% bm
	& $\bm{A}$
	& $\bm{\mathrm{A}}$
	& $\bm{\mathit{A}}$
	& $\bm{\mathbf{A}}$
	%
	& $\mathcal{A}$
	& $\mathscr{A}$
	& $\mathfrak{A}$
	& $\mathbb{A}$
	%
\end{tabular}
\end{document}
